metadata.title: CVE-2023-39130 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
GNU gdb (GDB) 13.0.50.20220805-git was discovered to contain a heap bufferoverflow via the function pe_as16() at /gdb/coff-pe-read.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39130` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 12.1-0ubuntu1~22.04.2
gdb-multiarch - 12.1-0ubuntu1~22.04.2
gdb-source - 12.1-0ubuntu1~22.04.2
gdbserver - 12.1-0ubuntu1~22.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdb package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '12.1-0ubuntu1~22.04.2').
